DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate safety tolerability ophthalmic solution PRO-156 ocular surface ophthalmologically healthy volunteer
DOC.brief_title: Safety Tolerability Ophthalmic Solution PRO-156 Ophthalmologically Healthy Volunteers .
DOC.detailed_description: A phase I , open label unicentric clinical trial evaluate safety tolerability ophthalmic solution PRO-143 ocular surface ophthalmologically healthy volunteer .
DOC.criteria: Healthy male female . Age 18 40 year old screening visit . Signed informed consent Patient one blind eye . Any ocular systemic condition . Visual acuity 20/100 eye . Use ocular systemics medication . Contraindications sensitivity component study treatment . Contact lens user . Ocular surgery within past 3 months.. Pregnant , nurse childbearing potential woman use effective contraception . Participation study investigational drug within 90 day previous inclusion .
